title: Scientific Papers on Reading?
content:
Hi,

I want to learn more about the process of reading. Does somebody know of any scientific papers or other resources that deal with topics such as legibility, visual perception or cognitive processing of written texts, etc...?

Thanks for your help!
author: webfont

comments.content:
Check out the journal Visible Language. The abstracts are searchable on the website.  
 [http://visiblelanguagejournal.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820180819/http:/visiblelanguagejournal.com/ "http://visiblelanguagejournal.com/")
That site looks very interesting. Thank you!
